bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of li ji 痢疾 , free-flux illness, affecting women after having given birth. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 44: 產後痢若變為血痢，則難治 , “If free-flux illness following delivery changes to bloody free-flux illness, this is difficult to cure”. Chan hou rou xian 產後肉綫 , flesh threads following delivery [1]

Pathological Condition with flesh threads that are painful when touched, protruding externally from the birth canal after delivery. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry sheng jiang 生薑』：產後肉綫，一婦 產後用力，垂出肉綫長三四尺，觸之痛引心腹欲絕 , “ Flesh threads following delivery : When a woman presses with force after delivery, she will cause flesh threads of a length of 3 to 4 chi to hang down [from her vagina]. When touched there will be pain pulling on the heart and abdomen so severe that she wishes to die”.
